about_the_game: The exhibition's main entrance/exit has mysteriously vanished. Help the guests to escape by completing a host of devilishly difficult and silly physics based challenges and puzzles with the aid of your 'hand on a stick' device.
detailed_description: The exhibition's main entrance/exit has mysteriously vanished. Help the guests to escape by completing a host of devilishly difficult and silly physics based challenges and puzzles with the aid of your 'hand on a stick' device.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher, SteamOS or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mobile Intel 4 Series Express Chipset Family or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard. Touchpad supported, but mouse strongly recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher, SteamOS or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard. Touchpad supported, but mouse strongly recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9+ !!!PROBLEMS RUNNING ON OSX HIGH SIERRA!!!
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mobile Intel 4 Series Express Chipset Family or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard. Touchpad supported, but mouse strongly recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9+ !!!PROBLEMS RUNNING ON OSX HIGH SIERRA!!!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard. Touchpad supported, but mouse strongly recommended

name: Dexterity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mobile Intel 4 Series Express Chipset Family or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard. Touchpad supported, but mouse strongly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard. Touchpad supported, but mouse strongly recommended

short_description: The exhibition's main entrance/exit has mysteriously vanished. Help the guests to escape by completing a host of devilishly difficult and silly physics based challenges and puzzles with the aid of your 'hand on a stick' device.
